short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View metadata of the current website inside Devtools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Metadata Viewer allows you to view the metadata of the website you are currently viewing in a visually appealing way. Additionally it will display additional information to specific meta-tags, including links to the specification, examples, type of the metatag, possible values and if the metatag is deprecated or not.

Just open the Devtools and click on the "Metadata Viewer" tab.
